chunks.zh: 也来聊聊彩礼，给还没结婚的做个参考
chunks.en: Let's also talk about betrothal gifts, as a reference for those who are not yet married.

chunks.zh: 最近聊彩礼的帖子很多，作为过来人给大家做个参考（反面案例）。
chunks.en: There have been many posts about betrothal gifts recently. As someone who has been through it, I'll give you a reference (a negative example).

chunks.zh: 先说说自己情况：
chunks.en: First, let me talk about my own situation:

chunks.zh: 1 老婆来自某著名彩礼省的山区，父母打工，家里 3 个女儿。
chunks.en: 1 My wife is from a mountainous area in a famous betrothal gift province. Her parents are migrant workers, and there are 3 daughters in the family.

chunks.zh: 2 我家河北，父母体制内职工，独生子。
chunks.en: 2 My family is from Hebei. My parents are state-owned enterprise employees, and I am an only child.

chunks.zh: 3 我和我老婆自由恋爱结婚。我老婆博士毕业，大学期间的学费都是助学贷款，工作后自己慢慢还掉的。
chunks.en: 3 My wife and I married through free love. My wife has a PhD. Her tuition fees during university were all student loans, which she slowly paid off after graduation.

chunks.zh: 4 我家在北京买了一套婚房，加了我老婆名字。
chunks.en: 4 My family bought a wedding house in Beijing and added my wife's name to it.

chunks.zh: 5 我坚决拒绝天价彩礼（我买房后也没钱给天价彩礼），加上我老婆意见也很坚持，最终她父母妥协（但还是以其他名义要了大约十万块礼钱）。
chunks.en: 5 I firmly refused a sky-high betrothal gift (I didn't have the money for a sky-high betrothal gift after buying the house), and my wife also insisted. In the end, her parents compromised (but still asked for about 100,000 yuan in gift money under other pretexts).

chunks.zh: 6 嫁妆 0 元。女方帮装修房子、买车这种事更是想都别想。一毛钱都没得。
chunks.en: 6 Dowry: 0 yuan. Don't even think about the woman's family helping with renovating the house or buying a car. Not a penny.

chunks.zh: 不要以为这就完事了。曾经我也以为，我是跟我老婆结婚，对于她的家庭我不在乎。然鹅，还是太天真了，后面还有一堆不开心的事等着：
chunks.en: Don't think this is the end of it. I used to think that I was marrying my wife and that I didn't care about her family. However, I was too naive. There were still a lot of unhappy things waiting for me later:

chunks.zh: 1 不要以为你买了套北京的房子加了女方名字，经济水平碾压他们，对他们女儿好，就会赢得尊重，以为自己乘龙快婿？对老丈人丈母娘而言，你没给彩礼，就是欠他们一笔钱，永远都对你爱答不理，永远不会把你当家人看待。
chunks.en: 1 Don't think that if you buy a house in Beijing, add the woman's name, and your economic level crushes them, and if you are good to their daughter, you will win respect, thinking you are marrying into a good family? As far as the father-in-law and mother-in-law are concerned, if you don't give a betrothal gift, you owe them money, and they will always ignore you and never treat you like family.

chunks.zh: 2 娘家人（丈人、丈母娘、小姨子）来北京，从不自己掏一分钱，能多啃我们一点就啃一点。往返路费，吃喝拉撒，都是主动要求让我们掏钱，而且是尽量多掏钱，花我们的钱不心疼，甚至还有种快感，花到就是赚到。能坐飞机绝不坐高铁，甚至主动要求买一等座。这么说吧，我从没见过她娘家人的付款码，有我在的场合从来不掏。
chunks.en: 2 When the wife's family members (father-in-law, mother-in-law, sister-in-law) come to Beijing, they never pay a penny themselves, and they try to sponge off us as much as possible. Round-trip travel expenses, food, drink, and accommodation are all proactively requested that we pay for them, and they try to make us pay as much as possible. They don't feel sorry for spending our money, and they even have a kind of pleasure, thinking that spending it is earning it. If they can take a plane, they will never take a high-speed train, and they even proactively ask to buy first-class seats. Let me put it this way, I have never seen her family's payment code. They never pay when I am around.

chunks.zh: 3 来女儿家，每次都是空着手来，背一大包东西走。我老婆的妹妹看上什么好带什么走。
chunks.en: 3 When they come to their daughter's house, they always come empty-handed and leave with a large bag of things. My wife's sister takes whatever she likes.

chunks.zh: 4 逢年过节得给丈人家送礼，但他们从来不给外孙女红包。小孩这些年，外公外婆花的钱总共不超过几百块。
chunks.en: 4 You have to give gifts to the in-laws during festivals, but they never give red envelopes to their granddaughter. Over the years, the grandparents have spent a total of no more than a few hundred yuan on the child.

chunks.zh: 5 回我老婆老家，来了一大堆“亲戚”，丈母娘说按照他们的风俗，每个人（不仅小孩子，五六十岁的大爷大妈）都要给红包，并且要摆酒席宴请他们（费用自然是我们全包）。
chunks.en: 5 When I go back to my wife's hometown, a lot of 'relatives' come. The mother-in-law says that according to their customs, everyone (not just children, but also elderly people in their fifties and sixties) must be given red envelopes, and a banquet must be held to entertain them (the cost is naturally all covered by us).

chunks.zh: 6 丈母娘暗示平常给他们的钱太少了。。。
chunks.en: 6 The mother-in-law hinted that the money we usually give them is too little...

chunks.zh: 诸如此类，其实目前来说都不是什么出格的大事，但确实也几乎没什么开心的事。
chunks.en: Things like this are not outrageous at the moment, but there is really almost nothing happy about them.

chunks.zh: 我跟我老婆感情很好，所以我选择了结婚。
chunks.en: My wife and I have a good relationship, so I chose to get married.

chunks.zh: 夜深人静的时候回过头想想，跟这样的家庭相处真的很累，很无奈，很傻逼。
chunks.en: When I look back late at night, it is really tiring, helpless, and stupid to get along with such a family.

chunks.zh: 永远在付出，永远在给予，但是没有什么回应，就好像无底洞。
chunks.en: Always giving, always giving, but there is no response, it's like a bottomless pit.

chunks.zh: 发帖的目的就是告诉还没结婚的，以及正在纠结的，特别是最近那些发帖的兄弟，你能不能接受这些事情，慎重考虑。我反正当时是没想到的。
chunks.en: The purpose of this post is to tell those who are not yet married, and those who are struggling, especially those brothers who have been posting recently, whether you can accept these things, and think carefully. I didn't expect it at the time.

chunks.zh: 不给，不接待，不理睬，会把你骨头拆散吃了么？你这自找的呀
chunks.en: If you don't give, don't entertain, and ignore them, will they tear you apart and eat your bones? You brought this on yourself.

chunks.zh: 吓人老哥，但你当下的包容值得尊敬🫡
chunks.en: Scary, bro, but your current tolerance is admirable🫡

chunks.zh: 你老婆怎么看这些事呢，无动于衷一点反应也没有吗？
chunks.en: What does your wife think about these things? Is she indifferent and unresponsive?

chunks.zh: 看完帖子大概就知道了，楼主和老婆肯定是感情很好的，而且双方对这种事也比较无奈，对楼主这种家庭来说，钱肯定不算多，但问题是有点膈应人。钱花了如果能有个笑脸或者热情的态度，那起码心里会舒服点。谁的钱都不是大风刮来的，总是这么往外掏谁都会不爽。遇到这种事咋说呢，肯定也没办法直接闹掰，毕竟事情没上升到那么大，只能说尽量少来往吧，重点还是自己的小日子，如果哪天要掀桌了再说吧（和老婆统一战线就好）。。。
chunks.en: After reading the post, I probably know that the poster and his wife must have a good relationship, and both sides are relatively helpless about this kind of thing. For the poster's family, the money is definitely not a lot, but the problem is that it's a bit of a nuisance. If you spend the money and get a smile or enthusiastic attitude in return, you will feel better in your heart. Nobody's money comes from strong winds, and everyone will be unhappy if they always have to pay out. What to say when you encounter this kind of thing? It is certainly impossible to break up directly, after all, things have not escalated that much. We can only say that we should try to have less contact. The focus is still on our own little life. If we have to flip the table one day, we'll talk about it then (just be on the same side as your wife).

chunks.zh: 建议 OP 和老婆沟通一下，说明自己的想法，看她是个什么态度。
chunks.en: I suggest the OP communicate with his wife, explain his thoughts, and see what her attitude is.

chunks.zh: 不是彩礼不彩礼，是你和乡下人结婚，那就是这样的。乡下人理解的女儿出嫁，就是别人家的人了，所以要收一笔钱。城里人，工人阶级家庭，哪有彩礼一说，关键是房子问题。
chunks.en: It's not about the betrothal gift or not, it's that you married a country person, and that's how it is. Country people understand that when their daughter gets married, she belongs to someone else's family, so they have to collect some money. City people, working-class families, don't talk about betrothal gifts, the key is the house problem.

chunks.zh: 我觉得这个问题出在你老婆。在这个帖子也提醒一下各位，一定要在婚前和对象商量好，要为对方，为自己的小家庭搞定自己父母，拒绝不合理的要求。  这个事情，只能是自己的父母自己搞定，对方来的话，容易伤感情。自己父母一般来说伤感情也终归是亲人。反过来说，如果因为这个就翻脸的，那就最好别往来了。
chunks.en: I think the problem lies with your wife. This post also reminds everyone that you must discuss with your partner before marriage and settle your own parents for each other and for your own small family, and reject unreasonable demands. This matter can only be settled by one's own parents. If the other party comes, it will easily hurt feelings. Generally speaking, if you hurt your own parents' feelings, they are still relatives after all. Conversely, if you turn your back on them because of this, it's best not to interact with them.

chunks.zh: 自私又小气的人，选择了就接受，磨磨唧唧。 丝毫没有想过尊重下妻子，妻子没有瞻仰老人的义务？ v 站这种人太多了，再家庭里面，处处要求平等，这么累就不要结婚。
chunks.en: Selfish and stingy person, accept it if you choose it, don't nag. Never thought about respecting his wife, doesn't the wife have the obligation to look after the elderly? There are too many people like this on v station. If you demand equality everywhere in the family, don't get married if you're so tired.

chunks.zh: 哥们，你以为你没给彩礼人家这样，还反思的？你给了彩礼人家也这样。我 0 彩礼，老丈人对我很满意，结婚前人奶奶就说别要彩礼，让人家看不起，人家就都没要。她们老两口来我这都不好意思过夜，我每次去他们那都啥啥不用干，弄得我都怪不好意思的，每次去都带不少东西...
chunks.en: Bro, you think they're like this because you didn't give a betrothal gift, and you're still reflecting on it? They'll be like this even if you give a betrothal gift. My betrothal gift was 0, and my father-in-law is very satisfied with me. Before we got married, my grandmother-in-law said not to ask for a betrothal gift, because people would look down on us, so they didn't ask for it. The two old people are embarrassed to stay overnight when they come to my place. Every time I go to their place, I don't have to do anything, which makes me feel very embarrassed. Every time I go, I bring a lot of things...

chunks.zh: 在他眼里你家有的是钱，只是不掏出来罢了想办法帮助你老婆别被原生家庭绑架，多与男方家来往，去女方家你就装作傻冒，不懂事的女婿得了
chunks.en: In their eyes, your family has a lot of money, but you just don't take it out. Try to help your wife not to be kidnapped by her family of origin, have more contact with the man's family, and when you go to the woman's family, you pretend to be a fool, and you'll be an ignorant son-in-law.

chunks.zh: “特别是最近那些发帖的兄弟，你能不能接受这些事情，慎重考虑”其实这没什么意义，以楼主为例，假设楼主开了天眼，知道了日后的种种，你就放弃你的另一半了？两个家庭的结合，必然都是两个复杂向量集的结合。你不可能因为某一点，或者某一方面的负面原因而否定全盘。同理，号称因为某一个细节的三观冲突，就导致两个家庭分崩离析。这一点也只是双方家庭分道扬镳的借口而已。
chunks.en: 'Especially those brothers who have been posting recently, can you accept these things, think carefully' In fact, this is meaningless. Take the poster as an example. Suppose the poster had a clairvoyant eye and knew everything that would happen in the future, would you give up your other half? The combination of two families is bound to be the combination of two complex vector sets. You can't negate the whole thing because of one point, or one negative aspect. Similarly, claiming that the conflict of values ​​in a certain detail led to the disintegration of the two families. This is just an excuse for the two families to part ways.

chunks.zh: 谢谢龟男兄弟帮忙消化清除社会上的江西女，好人一生平安
chunks.en: Thank you, brother, for helping to digest and eliminate Jiangxi women in society. May you live a long and peaceful life.

chunks.zh: 长期以往，不会影响夫妻关系吗
chunks.en: Won't this affect the relationship between husband and wife in the long run?

chunks.zh: 看着都觉得糟心
chunks.en: It feels terrible just looking at it.

chunks.zh: 博士，北京，你们的收入远大于他们我觉得一年花几千给你老婆家算少的
chunks.en: PhD, Beijing, your income is much higher than theirs, I think spending a few thousand a year on your wife's family is not much.

chunks.zh: 我女朋友也是江西的，我也是刚知道她们那边，居然要给亲戚长辈包红包，惊了
chunks.en: My girlfriend is also from Jiangxi, and I just found out that they have to give red envelopes to relatives and elders, which is shocking.

chunks.zh: 感觉当初彩礼给够也会有这些问题。
chunks.en: I feel like these problems would still exist even if the betrothal gift was enough.

chunks.zh: 如果你家经济明显好很多，就当每年 1W 块扶贫了，1W 块少一年的麻烦事儿，其实是划算的
chunks.en: If your family is obviously much better off financially, just treat it as 10,000 yuan a year for poverty alleviation. 10,000 yuan less of trouble a year is actually worth it.

chunks.zh: 女方这边的人和事情，女方接待和处理，根本不应该你出手
chunks.en: The woman should be responsible for receiving and handling the people and affairs on the woman's side. You shouldn't be involved at all.

chunks.zh: @dreamingclj 江西女是可以，但是江西婚嫁风气太扯淡了，不是你和你女朋友能左右的，你如果决定了和江西女朋友结婚，就要做好后面各种彩礼什么的够你喝一壶了。本人就是江西农村的。
chunks.en: @dreamingclj Jiangxi girls are okay, but the marriage customs in Jiangxi are too ridiculous, and you and your girlfriend cannot control it. If you decide to marry a Jiangxi girlfriend, you must be prepared for all kinds of betrothal gifts in the future to keep you busy. I am from rural Jiangxi.
